title: Photos From a 2016 Blog Shared as Indian Soldier Injured in Galwan
subtitle: Indian Soldier From Galwan Clash Photo Fact Check: A photo of a man with a scarred  back and a bandaged arm is being falsely shared to claim that this is a soldier of the Indian Army who was injured in the recent violent face-off between the troops
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A photo of a man with a scarred and an injured back, and a bandaged arm is being falsely shared to claim that this is a soldier of the Indian Army who was injured in the recent violent face-off between the troops of India and China at the Galwan Valley on 15 June.

However, this is at least a four-year-old photo which is unrelated to the Indian Army.
